Articles.Content:
Hi, as the tittle says,Im looking for a mod.

The description is, to the left of the part menu, it adds some buttons to only show some mod packs, like B9, NovaPunch, etc.

I would like that someone could say how its called.

Thanks.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35018-0-20-2-PartCatalog-1-1c-Create-Order-out-of-Chaos!

I assume you were talking about this?

While Camelot's listed mod is also a good organization mod it sounds to me like you're actually looking for this one:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/34779-0-20-Simple-Part-Organizer-(v0-250)

I believe they can actually be used together even if that's your cup of tea.

While Camelot's listed mod is also a good organization mod it sounds to me like you're actually looking for this one:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/34779-0-20-Simple-Part-Organizer-(v0-250)

Yeah, I've heard that one's really useful:)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35018-0-20-2-PartCatalog-1-1c-Create-Order-out-of-Chaos!

I assume you were talking about this?

That is the mod!

Thanks!
